question_text: Which two situations would require using a PoE injector instead of relying on a switch? (Select two)
answer_options: The switch supports only 10/100 Mbps speeds
The installation location is too far from the switch
The budget does not allow upgrading to a PoE-capable switch
correct_answer: The budget does not allow upgrading to a PoE-capable switch
explanation: PoE injectors are useful when your switch does not support PoE or replacing it is not financially viable. They're not meant to boost distance or support higher power classes.
